title: A student has just failed a psychology exam.

content.question: A student has just failed a psychology exam. Which of the following explanations is LEAST likely to be evidence of the self-serving bias?

choices.label: “That material was so hard that no one could have passed that class.”
“The room was too hot for me to be able to concentrate.”

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
